General.Name: Jiangnan Yifan Motor Co.Ltd
General.Description: Jiangnan Yifan Motor Co.,Ltd engages in the research and development, manufacture, and sale of customized micro and special gear motors in China and internationally. It offers energy storage and RV gear motors in the power transmission and distribution industry. The company's principal products include permanent magnet DC motors, AC/DC dual-use motors, three-phase asynchronous motors, single-phase capacitor motors, and other special non-standard motor, as well as other mechanical products. It serves electrical equipment manufacturers. The company was founded in 2011 and is based in Wuxi, China.
